title: Calculate Maximum Height
text: To find maximum height, find the y-coordinate of the vertex of the parabola.

title: Identify Max Height
text: The maximum height can be found by plugging in the x-coordinate from what time the max ball height is reached.

title: X-coordinate of Vertex
text: The x-coordinate is given by the value of $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$. Plug in to the function to find the value of the maximum height.
